item.title: Yara add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am not young enough to know everything." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Yara add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I think God, in creating man, somewhat overestimated his ability." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Yara add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "If one cannot enjoy reading a book over and over again, there is no use in reading it at all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Yara add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "You can never be overdressed or overeducated." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Yara add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Indeed I have always been of the opinion that hard work is simply the refuge of people who have nothing to do." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Yara add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Man is least himself when he talks in his own person. Give him a mask, and he will tell you the truth." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Yara add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Moderation is a fatal thing. Nothing succeeds like excess." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Yara add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I choose my friends for their good looks, my acquaintances for their good characters, and my enemies for their good intellects." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Yara add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The aim of life is self-development. To realize one's nature perfectly - that is what each of us is here for." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Yara add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "One should always play fairly when one has the winning cards." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Yara add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Go to heaven for the climate and hell for the company." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Yara add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Name the greatest of all inventors. Accident." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Yara add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Yara add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Often it does seem such a pity that Noah and his party did not miss the boat." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Yara add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "Whatever you can do or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius, power and magic in it!" -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Yara add a quote by Denis Waitley
item.description: "The greatest gifts you can give your children are the roots of responsibility and the wings of independence." -- Denis Waitley

item.title: Yara add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live." -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Yara add a quote by Johann wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "If I love you, what business is it of yours?" -- Johann wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Yara add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "Life belongs to the living, and he who lives must be prepared for changes" -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Yara add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Yara add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "Waste not a day in vain digression; with resolute, courageous trust seek every possible impression and make it firmly your posession you'll then work on because you must." -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Yara add a quote by Marcel Proust
item.description: "It comes so soon, the moment when there is nothing left to wait for." -- Marcel Proust

item.title: Yara add a quote by Apple Computer Inc.
item.description: "Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do." -- Apple Computer Inc.

item.title: Yara add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "I don't want to repeat my innocence. I want the pleasure of losing it again." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald
